original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 321.50/322.00 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 321.50/322.00 to the US dollar on Tuesday from 322.20/40 on Monday, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed stable at 13.60/80 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.02.2026, closed up at 13.80/14.00 percent from 13.80/90 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 13.80/95 percent from 13.80/90 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.03.2028 closed at 14.15/30 percent from 14.15/25 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.15/30 percent from 14.05/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed at 14.25/40 percent, from 14.10/30 percent. (Colombo/Jan2/2024)
